duties_responsibilities.duty: Support Area Manager and General Manager in managing the team of protectors.
Direct supervision for field crews and maintain field/office responsibilities.
Ensure safety, quality, training, employee engagement, and retention are prime focuses of the business.
Protect the company’s employees, customers, and assets against losses, injuries, and accidents through enforcement of safe work practices.
Coach, motivate, develop the team of protectors.
Develop relationships with internal and external customers to achieve goals and new business opportunities.

education_certification.credential: High School Diploma or GED completion, 4-year degree in a business-related field is a plus
